artifact.content: Name: Administrator login ID: UC1 Event: Administrator login to the system System: IPPhone Actors: Administrator Overview: Description of internal behaviors when the administrator logins to the system
Name: Administrator logout ID: UC2 Event: Administrator logout the system System: Actors: Administrator Overview: Description of internal behaviors when the administrator logouts

Name: Manage User Account ID: UC3 Event: Administrator manage user accounts in the system System: Actors: Administrator Overview: Description of internal behaviors when the administrator manages user account

Name: Manage IP and Phone Mapping ID: UC4 Event: Administrator manages the IP address and Phone mapping for the user account System: Actors: Administrator Overview: Description of internal behaviors when Administrator manages IP and Phone mapping for the user
Name: Manage Hardware ID: UC5 Event: Administrator manages hardwares System: Actors: Administrator Overview: Description of internal behaviors when Administrator manages hardwares

Name: Making a Phone Call ID: UC6 Event: Caller makes a phone call System: the IP phone subsystem and the server Actors: Caller, Callee Overview: User picks up the phone, dials the number and starts a conversation

Name: Manage Bills ID: UC7 Event: Administrator manages bills for the system including generates bills, modify bill and pay bill. System: Actors: Administrator Overview: Description of internal behavior of generating bills for all appropriate users

Name: Manage Plans ID: UC8 Event: Administrator manages the plans. System: Actors: Administrator Overview: Description of internal behavior of managing plan for user including set discount plan and modify plan.
